text: As for everything else, so for a mathematical theory: beauty can be perceived but not explained.
author: Arthur Cayley

text: One must learn, if one is to see the beauty in Japan, to like an extraordinarily restrained and delicate loveliness.
author: Miriam Beard

text: Talent, like beauty, to be pardoned, must be obscure and unostentatious.
author: Marguerite Gardiner

text: And at five o'clock in the morning we left to drive to Old Tucson, and I sat with my mouth open in the van. I was stunned by the beauty of that country.
author: Erika Slezak

text: Part of the beauty of the show in a way is that he's not perfect, but you can always count on him to do the right thing in a pinch. That's why he inspires people and inspires me.
author: Stephen Collins
